head_message.heading: One-Size-Fits-All Is For Baseball Caps & Parachute Pants, That Ain’t Us
head_message.text_line: We know every business is different, so we offer multiple ways to work together.

first_card.heading: Ongoing SEO Management
first_card.pera: We’ll handle all your content marketing and report the performance directly to you.

others_card.heading: One-Time SEO Audit
others_card.pera: We’ll give you a prioritized list of new experiments that you run.

others_card.heading: Ongoing SEO Consulting
others_card.pera: Avoid expensive mistakes and wasted time. Let us build it for you.

others_card.heading: One-Time SEO Setup
others_card.pera: We’ll give you the ongoing strategies and tactics for you to implement to increase metrics.

others_card.heading: Just SEO Performance
others_card.pera: Revenue share agreement with more upside for us, less risk for you.
